comment: The naive version of the class of reflexive relations ` { r e. Rels | A. x e. dom r x r x } ` is redundant with respect to the class of reflexive relations (see ~ dfrefrels3 ) in the class of equivalence relations. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 26-Oct-2022.)
